meanings.definition: A type of African musical instrument consisting of metal tines attached to a wooden board.
meanings.sent1: The mbiras produced beautiful sounds when played gently.
meanings.sent2: She learned to play the mbiras at a young age.
meanings.sent3: During the concert, the mbiras suddenly started playing on their own!
meanings.sent4: The mbiras' melody danced through the air, enchanting everyone.
meanings.sent5: The intricate design of the mbiras made them a joy to behold.
